content: crochet long cardigan pattern xs - xxl video tutorial link included pdf format 6 pages with high quality picture very easy to follow along very fun to make and it s very comfortable to wear as well i m really happy with this cardigan actually i m in love with it it s a longer cardigan this time and the color blend makes it more fun and bright than the last one it can be worn with a belt or open casual or classy if you want something for more everyday use it would look stunning in all black as well hope you enjoy happy crocheting materials lion brand wool-ease thick & quick stripe for color a coney island #6 super bulky weight yarn lion brand wool-ease thick & quick for color b cilantro #6 super bulky weight yarn crochet hook size 10 mm yarn needle scissors stitch markers notes this pattern uses english us terminology this pattern made as us women s xs s m l xl xxl this cardigan is made in 5 separate pieces and then sewn together the collar is added after the chains when you start will be the length of the cardigan if you want shorter or longer just make less or more chains at the beginning but the back panel and the front panel have to have the same amount of chains gauge blocked 6 5 single_crochet x 7 row = 4 6 double_crochet x 3 5 row = 4 sizes and measurements xs 17 14 width across x 35 69 length s 19 42 width across x 36 92 length m 21 71 width across x 38 15 length l 24 width across x 39 38 length xl 26 28 width across x 40 61 length xxl 28 57 width across x 41 84 length thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
